installation.script:
#Hogwarp Install Script

apt update -y
apt install -y curl file unzip

if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server/
fi

cd /mnt/server/
ARCHIVE_NAME="Hogwarp.zip"

# Validate link
if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then 
    if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail ${DOWNLOAD_URL}; then
        echo -e "link is valid. setting download link to ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
        DOWNLOAD_LINK=${DOWNLOAD_URL}
    else        
        echo -e "link is invalid closing out"
        exit 2
    fi
fi

curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o $ARCHIVE_NAME

# Unpack Server zip
# Backup and restore logic for config.json
if [ -f /mnt/server/config.json ]; then
    mv /mnt/server/config.json /mnt/server/config-backup.json
    unzip -o $ARCHIVE_NAME -d /mnt/server
    rm -f /mnt/server/config.json
    mv /mnt/server/config-backup.json /mnt/server/config.json
else
    unzip -o $ARCHIVE_NAME -d /mnt/server
fi

#Create the Plugins folder
mkdir -p /mnt/server/plugins/


## Install End
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Hogwarp Is Installed!"
echo "-----------------------------------------"
